message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.DC 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper proposes a new communication scheme and evaluates the broadcast capacity of the network, which are both related to information theory. 
2. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper deals with broadcasting information in a wireless network, which falls under the scope of networking and internet architecture. 
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The back-and-forth beamforming transmissions between different groups of nodes in the network can be seen as a control system, which falls under the scope of systems and control. 
4. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper deals with broadcasting data in a wireless network, which can be considered as a form of multimedia communication. 
5. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - The proposed communication scheme involves multiple nodes in the network working together to reinforce the signal's power, which can be seen as a form of distributed computing.
